Name: Minimize Project Duration
Description: Reduce total time from project start to end

Name: Maximize Team Velocity
Description: Increase average story points completed per sprint

Name: Minimize Feature Effort
Description: Keep total estimated effort of features as low as possible

Name: Maximize Team Utilization
Description: Ensure team members are optimally utilized across sprints

Name: Minimize Unresolved Blockers
Description: Reduce number of unresolved blockers hindering task progress

Name: Maximize Stakeholder Satisfaction
Description: Increase satisfaction based on feedback in reviews

Name: Minimize Budget Usage
Description: Stay within or below allocated project budget

Name: Maximize Skill Match
Description: Assign employees with the most relevant skills to tasks

Name: Minimize Task Switching
Description: Reduce context switching across different types of tasks

Name: Maximize Goal Achievement Rate
Description: Improve rate of sprint goals being achieved
